<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1237|בִּקְעָה]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּקְעָא‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==plain== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]; Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּקְעָה‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בקע‎</span>; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְבִקְעַת דּוּרָא‎</span> [[Dan.3.1|Dan 3:1]].
